title.v: thông tin phụ lục hợp đồng

items.key: (@@admin = 1 or bo_phan in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: @@admin = 1 or bo_phan in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)

command.text: declare @ho_ten nvarchar(256), @ma_nv varchar(32), @ngay_sinh smalldatetime, @noi_sinh nvarchar(512), @ten_bp nvarchar(512), @ngay_ky_hd smalldatetime select @ma_nv = rtrim(a.ma_nv), @ho_ten = rtrim(a.ho_nv) + space(1) + a.ten_nv, @ngay_sinh = a.ngay_sinh, @noi_sinh = a.noi_sinh , @ten_bp = case when @@language = 'v' then p.ten_bp else p.ten_bp2 end from hrnv a left join hrbp p on a.bo_phan = p.ma_bp where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec select @ngay_ky_hd = ngay_ky_hd from hrcthd where so_hdld in (select ma_so_hdld from @@table where stt_rec = @stt_rec and ngay_ky_plhd = @ngay_ky_plhd) select @ma_nv as ma_nv, @ho_ten as ho_ten, @ngay_sinh as ngay_sinh, isnull(@noi_sinh, '') as noi_sinh, @ten_bp as ten_bp%l, @ngay_ky_hd as ngay_ky_hd return

declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Thông tin phụ lục hợp đồng đang cập nhật đã được khai báo, không lưu được.' else N'This item already exists, it can not be saved.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Bản ghi hiện thời đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'This item has been modified or deleted by another user.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where stt_rec = @stt_rec and ngay_ky_plhd = @ngay_ky_plhd) begin select 'ma_nv' as field, @$exists as message return end if exists(select 1 from @@table where so_plhd = @so_plhd) begin select 'so_plhd' as field, @$exists as message return end select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select * from @@table where stt_rec = $stt_rec.OldValue and ngay_ky_plhd = $ngay_ky_plhd.OldValue) begin select 'ma_nv' as field, @$recordHasBeenChanged as message return end if (@so_plhd <> (select so_plhd from @@table where stt_rec = $stt_rec.OldValue and ngay_ky_plhd = $ngay_ky_plhd.OldValue)) begin if exists(select 1 from @@table where so_plhd = @so_plhd) begin select 'so_plhd' as field, @$exists as message return end end if (@stt_rec <> $stt_rec.OldValue or @ngay_ky_plhd <> $ngay_ky_plhd.OldValue) begin if exists(select * from @@table where (not (stt_rec = $stt_rec.OldValue and ngay_ky_plhd = $ngay_ky_plhd.OldValue)) and (stt_rec = @stt_rec and ngay_ky_plhd = @ngay_ky_plhd)) begin select 'ma_nv' as field, @$exists as message return end end
update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where stt_rec = @stt_rec and ngay_ky_plhd = @ngay_ky_plhd

action.text: if exists(select 1 from hrnv where ma_nv = @ma_nv) begin select a.stt_rec, a.ngay_sinh, a.noi_sinh, cast(case when a.cmnd_so <> '' then a.cmnd_ngay_hl else case when a.ho_chieu_so <> '' then ho_chieu_ngay_hl else null end end as smalldatetime) as ngay_hl, case when a.cmnd_so <> '' then isnull(t.ten_tinh, '') else case when a.ho_chieu_so <> '' then isnull(y.ten_qt, '') else '' end end as noi_cap, case when a.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then rtrim(a.dia_chi_th_tru) + case when d.ten_quan <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(d.ten_quan) + case when p.ten_tinh <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(p.ten_tinh) else '' end else '' end else '' end as dia_chi_th_tru, case when a.cmnd_so <> '' then a.cmnd_so else a.ho_chieu_so end as cmnd_so, case when @@language = 'v' then isnull(x.ten_bp, '') else isnull(x.ten_bp2, '') end as ten_bp from hrnv a left join hrdmtinh t on a.cmnd_noi_cap = t.ma_tinh left join hrdmtinh p on a.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = p.ma_tinh left join hrdmquan d on a.dia_chi_th_tru_quan = d.ma_quan and a.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = d.ma_tinh left join hrbp x on a.bo_phan = x.ma_bp left join dmqt y on a.ho_chieu_noi_cap = y.ma_qt left join hrvt z on a.vi_tri = z.ma_vtr where a.ma_nv = @ma_nv return end

if exists(select 1 from hrcthd where stt_rec = @stt_rec and so_hdld = @ma_so_hdld) begin select ngay_ky_hd, nghe_nghiep, nghe_nghiep2, so_ld, so_ngay_cap, so_noi_cap from hrcthd where stt_rec = @stt_rec and so_hdld = @ma_so_hdld return end
